query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN googleContactsAccessToken TEXT NULL AFTER calendarPreferences,
ADD COLUMN googleContactsRefreshToken TEXT NULL AFTER googleContactsAccessToken,
ADD COLUMN googleContactsTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER googleContactsRefreshToken;
